territories.heading: SERVICE CLASSIFICATION CONTAINED
territories.text:
IN THIS TARIFF, THE NYISO
LOAD ZONES WILL BE REFERRED TO AS LOAD ZONES A, B, C, D, E, AND F. A limited number of Customers located
near subzone and/or franchise borders may not correspond to the Zone locations below. The customer’s electrical location is
determined by the corresponding feeder and substation.

FOOTNOTES:
1. Brocton: General lighting service may be taken only when permitted by Village authorities.
2. Depew: Limited to large general service, Demand of 75 kW or more.
3. Lancaster: Limited to large general service, Demand of 75 kW or more.
4. Cheektowaga: A portion of the town is limited to large general service with Demand of 75 kW or more.
5. Ellicott: Except Lighting Districts (1), (2), and (3).
6. Hamburg: A portion of the town is limited to large general service with Demand of 75 kW or more.
7. West Seneca: A portion of the town is limited to large general service with Demand of 75 kW or more.
Issued by Thomas B. King, President, Syracuse, NY
